subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Internationl Paranormal Radio Show
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Great show everyone. I found it inspirational. Our beliefs dont always match across the globe (or in this group) but it's nice when we can come together in spirit and keep our hearts in the right place. 

Misty


--- On Sat, 9/20/08, ghuny1 <ghuny1@...> wrote:

> From: ghuny1 <ghuny1@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Internationl Paranormal Radio Show
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Saturday, September 20, 2008, 11:30 AM
> International Paranormal radio hosted by psychic and EVP/ITC
> & Box
> researcher, Laura Kimberley with co-hosts Ray Jorden from
> the UK TV
> series the Paranormal 5, Ghost Box Researcher
> "Doctor" Jeff Rezman,
> and editor of the Paranormal Python, Annette Munnich will
> be coming to
> you live via APSR Radio every Saturday at 4 PM EST. A chat
> room will
> be available from the IPAA Awards my space site at
> http://myspace.com/ipaa2009.
> Get the latest on the International Paranormal
> Acknowledgment awards
> from Laura Kimberley herself and enjoy conversation about
> the
> paranormal world!
> http://www.apsrradio.com/  Tune in!!
> 
> Look forward to hearing from all of you. Please join us.
> Interested in being a guest on the show? Please email me
> privately 
> itcnap@...
> 
> Blessings,
> LK
